body.p: Then you remember: You are carrying a sandbag! You wonder if it’s heavy enough to hold down the platform. You place it on the platform and it clicks. The door slides open.
“[$FriendName$],” you say, “let’s get out of here.”

His face breaks into a smile and he dashes towards the door. You step out after him, and the two of you find yourself in a forest clearing. The door slides shut behind you. When you turn around, you see a solid rock face – you can’t even tell where the door used to be.
“I don’t know how I can ever thank you, [$Name$],” [$FriendName$] says. “One thing, though. I don’t think my name is actually [$FriendName$]. I think it’s Bob.”
